briefTitle: Extension Study to Evaluate IV CR845 in Hemodialysis Patients With Moderate-to-Severe Pruritus
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Extension Study to Evaluate the Long Term Safety of Intravenous CR845 in Hemodialysis Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease-Associated Pruritus
summary: This is an open-label multicenter, long-term extension safety study to evaluate the safety of IV CR845 administered after each dialysis session over a Treatment Period of up to 52 weeks.
